Privacy Policy

How we collect, use, and protect information on our public website.

Information We Collect

Public Website

This public website is designed for informational purposes only. We do not collect, process, or store sensitive government data on this site. Any information collected is limited to:

  • Contact form submissions (when enabled)
  • Website analytics (with user consent)
  • Basic website usage statistics

Azure Government Environment

All sensitive workloads and government data are processed exclusively within our Azure Government environment, which operates under FedRAMP High compliance and separate privacy controls.

How We Use Information

Information collected on this public website is used solely for:

  • Responding to inquiries and contact requests
  • Improving website functionality and user experience
  • Providing information about our services

Data Protection

We implement appropriate security measures to protect information collected on this public website, including:

  • Content Security Policy (CSP) headers
  • Secure transmission protocols (HTTPS)
  • Regular security assessments
  • Minimal data collection practices

Third-Party Services

This website may use third-party services for analytics (with user consent) and functionality. These services are selected for their privacy compliance and security standards.

Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Opt out of analytics tracking
  • Request information about data we collect
  • Request deletion of your information
  • Contact us with privacy concerns

Contact Information

For privacy-related questions or concerns, please contact us at:

Email: consulting@headentechsolutions.com

Policy Updates

This privacy policy may be updated periodically. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

Last Updated: December 2024
